actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a moratorium for the excise tax on diesel fuel sold for or used in noncommercial diesel-powered motorboats and to require the Secretary of the Treasury to study the effectiveness of procedures to collect excise taxes on sales of diesel fuel for noncommercial motorboat use.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to prohibit diesel motorboat fuel excise taxes for two years after enactment of this Act. Mandates a study and report to specified congressional committees on procedures for collecting excise taxes on diesel fuel for noncommercial motorboats.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a moratorium for the excise tax on diesel fuel sold for or used in noncommercial diesel-powered motorboats and to require the Secretary of the Treasury to study the effectiveness of procedures to collect excise taxes on sales of diesel fuel for noncommercial motorboat use.
